name: LinkShades
0:
”Alexa, set kitchen shade to 50%”
”Alexa, raise the living room left shade”
”Alexa, lower the bedroom shade to 20%”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
After activating your shades through, app.linkshades.com. Enable this Alexa Skill Set to control them through Voice Command. 
Commands are:
"Raise Living Room Shade" for shade to go to up position.
"Lower Living Room Shade" for shade to go to bottom position"
"Set Shades to X percent" for shades to go to desired position.
